ovdesc.p: This file is available only in a T24 Administration Account.
Each record is used to control linking / unlinking to a UniVerse / jBASE account representing a business entity.
The actions LINK and UNLINK may be performed on an account. The action is performed when the record is verified.

desc.p: Shows whether the link has been established or not.
This is a NOINPUT field.
The name of the UniVerse account / arbitrary name in jBASE, which contains the business entity's data. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
It must be the name of a Universe account / jBASE account with T24 installed.
The release of T24 in the business entity must be the same as
that in the admin. account (Case sensitive)
A maximum of 30 characters may be entered.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.

Determines the action to be taken when this record is verified.
LINK : Connect/Re-link the business entity to the admin. account.
UNLINK : Break the link to the business entity
Mandatory input.
Short input of "L" or "U" is permitted.
A maximum of 6 characters may be entered.
The following values are permitted: LINK, UNLINK
